thread.title: Phone muzzle to protect privacy by muffling voice

title: Phone muzzle to protect privacy by muffling voice
text:
Phone muzzle to protect privacy by muffling voice 7:31am EST - 01:47 
Ukrainian developers say they have found a way to keep important calls private while on the move, at the same time minimising irritating sounds reaching people within earshot. Matthew Bell reports.   
Ukrainian developers say they have found a way to keep important calls private while on the move, at the same time minimising irritating sounds reaching people within earshot. Matthew Bell reports.  //reut.rs/2sxOxz9
